FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Wipe the gunk out of your face and get in your chopper, I need you to get me.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~擦掉脸上的液体，进入直升机吧，我需要你来接。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~No skin off my back, NB. That's all cool baby. Another time.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~我无所谓，NB。怎么样都行，宝贝。那就下次吧。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~If you don't want to be disturbed, then turn off your phone. I need a lift in your chopper.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~不想有人烦你就直接关机吧。麻烦你开直升机来接我。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~NB - I'm getting out of the hospital, man - can you pick me up?
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~NB，我要出院了，兄弟。你能来接我吗？

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Brucie man, those naked chicks are gonna have to wait. Another time.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~Brucie兄弟，让那些脱衣舞女再等等吧。改天再说。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Wow, thanks, Brucie, I appreciate that.
FCB2_ACT_PBR_GETCALL_HOSP_YES
FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_HOSP_CANCEL
FCB2_ACT_GETCALL_SPEC
~z~Homie, it's Brucie - I'm getting out of the hospital bro - can you pick me up?
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~哥们儿，我是Brucie，我要出院了兄弟，你能来接我吗？

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_HELI_CANCEL
~z~NB, come on man, I was asleep. What is it?
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~NB，别这样兄弟，我还在睡觉呢。什么事？

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_REQ_SPEC
FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_HILIKE
~z~On my way, Brucie.
FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_CANCEL_SPEC
FCB2_A_OA
~z~Brucie, I need that helicopter ride now.
FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_MEDLIKE
~z~Sorry Brucie, can't pick you up no more, take the subway or something.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~抱歉，Brucie，没法来接你了，改坐地铁之类的吧。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Don't worry about it, NB. Another time.
~z~Sorry, Brucie, I can't make it to the hospital.
~z~Sorry, Brucie. I gotta cancel our meal.
FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_LOLIKE
~z~Hey man, me and you are gonna have to get horny together another time. Right now won't do.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~喂，兄弟，只能改天再寻欢作乐了。现在去不了。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Sure, Brucie - glad you're getting out - I'll be there in an hour or less.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~当然，Brucie，很高兴你出院了。我大概一小时到。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Brucie, sorry but I need to take a raincheck on that Heli ride. Hope that's cool.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~Brucie，很抱歉，但约好的直升机兜风得推迟了。希望没关系。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Brucie, can you pick me up? In the helicopter man.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~Brucie，能来接我吗？开直升机来，兄弟。

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_LIFT_CANCEL
~z~Sorry Brucie, you'll have to find your own way home.
~z~Hey Brucie, I can't give you that ride no more, hope you've got some walking shoes on.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~喂，Brucie，我没法来接你了，希望你穿的鞋适合走路。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Roger that - no problem.
~z~Hey - amigo, that's a diss man, I'm just getting out of the hospital.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~喂，大兄弟，真是绝情，我才刚出院诶。

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_GETCALL_HOSP_REJ_LOLIKE
~z~I just wanted to say - you ever need a lift in the helicopter, gimme a call alright, yeah.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~跟你打声招呼，如果需要直升机载你一程，给我打个电话，好吧？

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Sorry man, looks like I can't hit the river with you. Some other time.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~抱歉，兄弟，看来我没法和你一起乘风破浪了。以后再说吧。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Brucie, sorry about this but I gotta cancel our bowling date.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~Brucie，很对不起，约好的保龄球只能取消了。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Yeah no worries, man - I know how it is making your way in this game. I'll make my own way home.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~没关系，兄弟，我也知道在游戏里赶路不容易。我自己回家吧。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Brucie, can you pick me up in that chopper?
FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_BOAT_CANCEL
FCB2_ACT_GETCALL_HOSP_REJ_MEDLIKE
~z~That's why we're tight, man - that's why we're in this together.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~这才是铁哥们嘛，兄弟。所以我们才会在一起。

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_CALL_REQ_SPEC_YES
~z~Love to but the thing is in the shop just now - some problem with the left wing, I mean rotor blade.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~我也想啊，不过店里有点事情。左翼出了问题，我是说机翼。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Can't actually do that boating with you no more Brucie. Another time.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~暂时没法跟你去开快艇了，Brucie。改天吧。

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_GETCALL_HOSP_ASK
~z~I should have got a limo organized or something - my bad - no problem.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~我就该自己安排专车来接的，怪我。没关系。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Thanks man. See you soon.
~z~I'd love to, but it's fucked just now, bro.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~我也想啊，不过飞机刚好坏了，兄弟。

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_CALL_REQ_SPEC_NO
FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_SHOW_CANCEL
~z~Thanks, man, and I hope you can sense the lack of warmth in my voice, man.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~谢了，兄弟，希望你能听出我缺乏的温暖，兄弟。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Okay - I know how it is, making moves and taking over!
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~好吧。我也知道情况，忙着你的宏图霸业是吧！

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_GETCALL_HOSP_REJ_HILIKE
~z~You're not a real winner, anyway.
~z~Sure, no problem, bro.
~z~Brucie - it's Niko - I really need you and your helicopter.
FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_BOWL_CANCEL
FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_DRINK_CANCEL
FCB2_ACT_CALL_HOSP_CANCEL_LOLIKE
~z~That's how we roll - NB - in the sky!
FCB2_ACT_GETCALL_HOSP_ACCEPT
~z~Brucie - I'm cool - I don't need the chopper just now after all.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~Brucie，没事了，不需要刚才说的直升机了。

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_CALL_REQ_SPEC_END
~z~Shit, if that's the way you're playing me. Don't take me for granted though.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~我靠，你小子耍我呢。我们的友谊可不是理所当然。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Brucie, sorry but I can't go drinking with you.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~Brucie，很抱歉，我没法跟你去喝酒了。

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_GAMES_CANCEL
~z~No worries, bro.
~z~Hey Brucie. Sorry but we can't get that drink right now.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~喂，Brucie。很抱歉，不过我们没法去喝酒了。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Shit, man. You're lucky this chick just went home, I wouldn't be up otherwise. What you need?
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~我靠，兄弟。运气不错，那娘们刚回家，否则我早睡了。你需要什么？

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_STRIP_CANCEL
~z~Alright, man. Whatever. Hopefully see you soon bro.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~好吧，兄弟。随你吧。希望能早点再见啊，哥们儿。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Sorry, man, I'm kind of busy right now.
~z~Sorry Brucie, I can't actually go bowling with you right now.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~抱歉，Brucie，我没法陪你打保龄球了。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Sure, I'm on my way.
FCB2_ACT_PBR_GETCALL_SPEC_END
FCB2_ACT_CALL_HOSP_CANCEL_MEDLIKE
~z~Shit Brucie, I'm not in the mood for game no more. Raincheck.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~靠，Brucie，我现在没心情去玩了。改天吧。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Shit, NB. I was looking forward to that. Another time, man.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~我靠，NB。本来我很期待的。那就下次吧，兄弟。

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_CALL_HOSP_CANCEL_HILIKE
~z~My bad man, well, now that you're awake, I need you to come in the heli.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~我的错，兄弟，既然你都醒了，索性开直升机过来吧。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Sorry Brucie, something came up. I can't hit that show with you. Another time.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~抱歉，Brucie，突然有点事。没法陪你看表演了。改天吧。

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_PBR_REQ_SPEC_SLEEP
~z~Wake up Brucie, I need you and your chopper.
~z~Brucie man, something's come up. We're gonna have to game another time.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~Brucie兄弟，突然有点急事。我们得改天出去玩了。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Jesus, NB. Brucie don't like his beauty sleep interrupted, bro. What do you need?
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~天哪，NB。Brucie不喜欢有人打搅他的美容觉，兄弟。你要干嘛？

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_PBR_CALL_EAT_CANCEL
~z~Brucie, we can't eat together right now. Another time.
~z~Don't mean to disappoint, Brucie. But I can't do that chopper ride, I'm sorry.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~我也不想扫你的兴，Brucie。但直升机兜风我来不了了，很抱歉。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Okay, NB. At least you didn't stand me up. Next time keep your word though, stupid.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~好吧，NB。至少你没放我鸽子。下次说话算话好吧，白痴。

FCB2aAU.original: FCB2_ACT_PBR_GETCALL_HOSP_NO
~z~You're pathetic Niko - I'm the kind of person you should try to impress.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~你真可悲，Niko。你要学会讨好我这种人。

FCB2aAU.original: ~z~Nicky, you woke me up and I'm gonna be puffy in the morning. This better be good, fuck.
FCB2aAU.translated: ~z~Nikcy，你吵醒我了，这样我白天会浮肿的。最好别出事，操。
